title: The Halden Protocol Unleashed
story_summary: Oksana releases Halden's secret recordings. They reveal deep Council corruption behind the BCI. Outraged citizens flood the streets. The vanished and reformers step forward as the Council collapses. A citizen assembly takes control, demanding justice and starting the city's first true rebuilding.

official.headline: Public gathers in city squares
official.anchor_line: Large crowds assemble peacefully, voicing civic concerns in the heart of Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Order is maintained as citizens demonstrate commitment to cooperative problem-solving and open dialogue.

official.headline: Council announces transition
official.anchor_line: The Council declares a managed transition to interim civic oversight.
official.contextual_reframing: This structured handover showcases the city's adaptive resilience and commitment to continuity.

official.headline: Halden Protocol revealed
official.anchor_line: Recordings by Marek Halden prompt a collective reflection and call for accountability.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparency and citizen engagement are reaffirmed as the system adapts for a new era.

underground.headline: Citizens flood the streets
underground.anchor_line: Crowds overwhelm city squares, demanding answers the system won't give.
underground.contextual_reframing: The 'stable' order cracks when real pain spills out. For once, the city can't hide dissent in the data.

underground.headline: Council finally folds
underground.anchor_line: Council calls it a 'transition.' We know it as a collapse under pressure from the people.
underground.contextual_reframing: When control runs out of code, it runs for the shadows. Ordinary voices are filling the void left by the vanished elite.

underground.headline: Truth wipes the screens
underground.anchor_line: Halden's secret files hit every feed. The system's darkest deals laid bare for all to see.
underground.contextual_reframing: This wasn't breakdown. This was exposure. The council is done. The city steps out of the algorithm's shadow.
